publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5668♦ Stuart McMillan: Community Service Assistance—That the Parliament recognises the work carried out during the recent adverse weather conditions by offenders given community service orders; understands that tasks were completed satisfactorily and with obvious community benefit, and would welcome introduction of a similar scheme, where possible, with those people carrying out community service orders assisting to clear out watercourses and culverts where communities such as Greenock and other areas in Inverclyde have been at risk of flooding. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Brian Adam*, Bob Doris*
S3M-5668♦ Community Service Assistance (lodged on 3 February 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*, Robin Harper*
